sentences.text: Corporate Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apple believes that effective corporate governance should include regular constructive discussions with our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have a proactive engagement process that encourages feedback from our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This feedback helps shape our governance practices, which include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A majority voting standard for uncontested elections of directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: One or more holders entitled to cast at least 10% of votes are permitted to call a special meeting of shareholders;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adoption of proxy access in 2015, and recently adopted enhancements to our proxy access bylaws to make it easier for shareholders to nominate director candidates;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Changes to the performance-based component of the long-term equity incentives under our 2017 executive compensation program; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock ownership guidelines for our CEO, executive officers, and directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board of Directors and Committees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Age as of Annual Meeting Director Since (calendar year) Audit Committee Compensation Committee Nominating Committee James Bell 68 2015 Tim Cook Chief Executive Officer 56 2011 Al Gore 68 2003 Bob Iger 66 2011 Andrea Jung 58 2008 Art Levinson Chairman of the Board 66 2000 Ron Sugar 68 2010 Sue Wagner 55 2014
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 7.6 Years Average Tenure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2 New Directors in Last Three Years
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apple Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: | 2017 Proxy Statement | 4
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apple Values
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Inclusion and Diversity apple.com/diversity
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apple believes diversity is more than one gender, race, or ethnicity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: lt is the entire human experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apple believes that technology should be accessible to everyone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our hiring trends over the last three years show steady progress in attracting more women and under-represented minorities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our products are powerful and affordable assistive devices, with built-in accessibility features such as VoiceOver, SwitchControl, and support for Made for iPhone hearing aids.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We achieved pay equity in the United States for similar roles and performance, and we are committed to maintaining pay equity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We received the 2016 Robert S. Bray Award from the American Council of the Blind for continued accessibility innovation across all of our products.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Supplier Responsibility apple.com/supplier-responsibility
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Education apple.com/education
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apple is committed to providing fair and safe working conditions, creating greater opportunities for workers, and transparently reporting on our efforts at every level of the supply chain.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apple believes education is a fundamental human right and that a quality education should be accessible to all.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our ConnectED program has helped create transformative learning environments in 114 underserved U.S. schools, reaching over 4,000 teachers and 50,000 students.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of December 2016, 100% of smelters/refiners committed to or are participating in third-party assessments for tin, tungsten, tantalum, gold, and cobalt.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Apple Teacher program delivers free professional development for educators, and Everyone Can Code provides free materials to learn, write, and teach code.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We conducted 705 supply chain assessments on labor and human rights, health and safety, and environment in 2016, covering over 1.3 million workers in 30 countries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Environment apple.com/environment
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Security is fundamental to the design of all Apple hardware, software, and services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apple takes the same innovative approach to the environment as we do with our products.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apple has been protecting user data for over a decade with SSL and TLS in Safari, File Vault on Mac, and encryption that is built into iOS.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We use 100% renewable energy in 23 countries, and 93% of the electricity in 2015 for our global operations comes from renewable sources.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We utilize privacy by design to help create the best user experience and we never sell user data.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2015, over 99% of the virgin paper used in our product packaging came from sustainably managed forests or controlled wood sources.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apple Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: General
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why am I receiving these materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are invited to attend Apples 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareholders and vote on the proposals described in this Proxy Statement because you were an Apple shareholder on December 30, 2016 (the Record Date).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apple is soliciting proxies for use at the Annual Meeting, including any postponements or adjournments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if you plan on attending the Annual Meeting in person, we encourage you to vote your shares in advance using one of the methods described in this Proxy Statement to ensure that your vote will be represented at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These materials were first sent or made available to shareholders on January 6, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is included in these proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice of 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proxy Statement for the Annual Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apples Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended September 24, 2016 (the Annual Report)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you requested printed versions by mail, these printed proxy materials also include the proxy card or voting instruction form for the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apple Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: | 2017 Proxy Statement | 6
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why did I receive a one-page notice in the mail regarding the internet availability of proxy materials instead of a full set of proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apple uses the internet as the primary means of furnishing proxy materials to shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are sending a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials (the Notice of Internet Availability) to our shareholders with instructions on how to access the proxy materials online or request a printed copy of the materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders may follow the instructions in the Notice of Internet Availability to elect to receive future proxy materials in print by mail or electronically by email.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We encourage shareholders to take advantage of the availability of the proxy materials online to help reduce the environmental impact of our annual meetings, and reduce Apples printing and mailing costs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apples proxy materials are also available at investor.apple.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I share an address with another shareholder, and we received only one paper copy of the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How can I obtain an additional copy of the proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apple has adopted a procedure called householding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under this procedure, Apple may deliver a single copy of the Notice of Internet Availability and, if you requested printed versions by mail, this Proxy Statement and the Annual Report to multiple shareholders who share the same address, unless Apple has received contrary instructions from one or more of the shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This procedure reduces the environmental impact of our annual meetings, and reduces Apples printing and mailing costs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders who participate in householding will continue to receive separate proxy cards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon written or oral request, Apple will deliver promptly a separate copy of the Notice of Internet Availability and, if you requested printed versions by mail, this Proxy Statement and the Annual Report to any shareholder that elects not to participate in householding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To receive, free of charge, a separate copy of the Notice of Internet Availability and, if you requested printed versions by mail, this Proxy Statement or the Annual Report, or separate copies of any future notice, proxy statement, or annual report, you may write or call Apple at the following email address, physical address, or phone number:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: investor_relations@apple.com
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apple Investor Relations 1 Infinite Loop MS: 301-4IR Cupertino, California 95014 (408) 974-3123
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are receiving more than one copy of the proxy materials at a single address and would like to participate in householding, please contact Apple at the email address, physical address, or phone number above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders who hold shares in street name may contact their brokerage firm, bank, broker-dealer, or other similar organization to request information about householding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the quorum requirement for the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holders of a majority of the shares entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting must be present at the Annual Meeting in person or by proxy for the transaction of business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is called a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your shares will be counted for purposes of determining if there is a quorum if:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are entitled to vote and you are present in person at the Annual Meeting; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You have properly voted by proxy online, by phone or by submitting a proxy card or voting instruction form by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apple Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: | 2017 Proxy Statement | 7
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker non-votes and abstentions are counted for purposes of determining whether a quorum is present.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a quorum is not present, we may propose to adjourn the Annual Meeting to solicit additional proxies and reconvene the Annual Meeting at a later date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who will serve as the inspector of election?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A representative from Apples transfer agent, Computershare Trust Company, N.A. (Computershare), will serve as the inspector of election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who is paying the costs of this proxy solicitation?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apple is paying the costs of the solicitation of proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apple has retained Georgeson LLC to assist in the distribution of proxy materials and the solicitation of proxies from brokerage firms, banks, broker-dealers, and other similar organizations representing beneficial owners of shares for the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have agreed to pay Georgeson a fee of approximately $15,000 plus out-of-pocket expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may contact Georgeson at (866) 828-4304.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apple must also pay brokerage firms, banks, broker-dealers, and other similar organizations representing beneficial owners certain fees associated with:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Forwarding the Notice of Internet Availability to beneficial owners;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Forwarding printed proxy materials by mail to beneficial owners who specifically request them; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Obtaining beneficial owners voting instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to solicitations by mail, the proxy solicitor and Apples directors, officers, and employees, without additional compensation, may solicit proxies on Apples behalf in person, by phone, or by electronic communication.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Where are Apples principal executive offices located and what is Apples main phone number?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apples principal executive offices are located at 1 Infinite Loop, Cupertino, California 95014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apples main phone number is (408) 996-1010.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is Apples fiscal year?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apples fiscal year is the 52- or 53-week period that ends on the last Saturday of September.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless otherwise stated, all information presented in this Proxy Statement is based on Apples fiscal calendar.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who may vote at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each share of Apples common stock has one vote on each matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only shareholders of record as of the close of business on the Record Date are entitled to attend and vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of the Record Date, there were 5,257,816,000 shares of Apples common stock issued and outstanding, held by 26,000 shareholders of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to shareholders of record of Apples common stock, beneficial owners of shares held in street name as of the Record Date can vote using the methods described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Apple Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: | 2017 Proxy Statement | 8
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
